text: 13.12 Epe 5.11, 6.11-13, Kol 3.8, 1 Te 5.5-6, 1 Jo 2.8 Sɨb gup bad ak kul gɨnɨgeb, man tɨkɨnɨgeb. Anɨb ak chɨn tap kɨsɨlɨm owup bad ak mɨdupsek kelɨgɨl, tap mɨlek sek ak dɨnɨgun. Pen tap mɨlek sek anɨb ak, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep tap okok mɨdeb tek mɨdeb. Anɨb ak tap anɨb ak chech tek dɨl lɨl yonɨgun.
